headline: NXP Semiconductors price target raised to $285 from $275 at Citi
summary: Citi raised the firm’s price target on NXP Semiconductors (NXPI) to $285 from $275 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares following a transfer of coverage. The firm rolled forward its valuation to 2027 estimates from 2026.Claim 70% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time,
